item.title: Selah add a quote by Alex Garland
item.description: "Though I walk through the valley of death I will fear no evil, for I am the evilest motherfucker in the valley" -- Alex Garland

item.title: Selah add a quote by Alex Garland
item.description: "I carry a lot of scars. I like the way that sounds. I carry a LOT of scars." -- Alex Garland

item.title: Selah add a quote by Kathryn Stockett
item.description: "You is kind. You is smart. You is important." -- Kathryn Stockett

item.title: Selah add a quote by Kathryn Stockett
item.description: "I always thought insanity would be a dark, bitter feeling, but it is drenching and delicious if you really roll around in it." -- Kathryn Stockett

item.title: Selah add a quote by Kathryn Stockett
item.description: "Wasn't that the point of the book? For women to realize, We are just two people. Not that much separates us. Not nearly as much as I'd thought." -- Kathryn Stockett

item.title: Selah add a quote by Kathryn Stockett
item.description: "Ugly live up on the inside. Ugly be a hurtful, mean person." -- Kathryn Stockett

item.title: Selah add a quote by Kathryn Stockett
item.description: "I listened wide-eyed, stupid. Glowing by her voice in the dim light. If chocolate was a sound, it would've been Constantine's voice singing. If singing was a color, it would've been the color of that chocolate." -- Kathryn Stockett

item.title: Selah add a quote by Kathryn Stockett
item.description: "I want to yell so loud that Baby Girl can hear me that dirty ain't a color, disease ain't the Negro side a town. I want to stop that moment from coming - and it come in ever white child's life - when they start to think that colored folks ain't as good as whites. ... I pray that wasn't her moment, Pray I still got time." -- Kathryn Stockett

item.title: Selah add a quote by Kathryn Stockett
item.description: "All my life I'd been told what to believe about politics, coloreds, being a girl. But with Constantine's thumb pressed in my hand, I realized I actually had a choice in what I could believe." -- Kathryn Stockett

item.title: Selah add a quote by Kathryn Stockett
item.description: "That's all a grit is, a vehicle. For whatever it is you rather be eating." -- Kathryn Stockett

item.title: Selah add a quote by Kathryn Stockett
item.description: "Got to be the worst place in the world, inside a oven. You in here, you either cleaning or you getting cooked." -- Kathryn Stockett

item.title: Selah add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description:
"This wasn't just plain terrible, this was fancy terrible. This was terrible with raisins in it."
[<i>Women Know Everything!</i>]" -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Selah add a quote by Sara Gruen
item.description: "With a secret like that, at some point the secret itself becomes irrelevant. The fact that you kept it does not." -- Sara Gruen

item.title: Selah add a quote by Sara Gruen
item.description: "When you are five, you know your age down to the month. Even in your twenties, you know how old you are. I'm twenty-three you say, or maybe twenty-seven. But then in your thirties, something strange starts to happen. It is a mere hiccup at first, an instant of hesitation. How old are you? Oh, I'm--you start confidently, but then you stop. You were going to say thirty-three, but you are not. You're thirty-five. And then you're bothered, because you wonder if this is the beginning of the end. It is, of course, but it's decades before you admit it." -- Sara Gruen

item.title: Selah add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Selah add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "The story so far: In the beginning the Universe was created. This has made a lot of people very angry and been widely regarded as a bad move." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Selah add a quote by Charlotte Brontë
item.description: "I am no bird; and no net ensnares me: I am a free human being with an independent will." -- Charlotte Brontë
